EmailTemplate.name: Parent Newsletter Link
EmailTemplate.subject: Parent Newsletter Link
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Parents, Please be informed that the Parent Newsletter is now available on the following link...... http://www.internationalschool.ru/info/Quicklinks/Newsletters/en This is a monthly letter with school, class and community news for our ISM families. Don't miss out on keeping up to date with the goings on at ISM !!! Best Regards The Admissions Team
